file.name: schema.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1 info: version: 1.0.0 title: TED description: Realize transferencias de valores através do canal de pagamentos TED. Consulte também nossa [documentação](https://bankly.readme.io/v1.0/docs/) para mais detalhes sobre os fluxos de negócio. servers: - url: 'https://api-mtls.sandbox.bankly.com.br' paths: /fund-transfers: post: tags: - Operações via TED summary: Transferência via TED description: |

Transfira valores monetários de forma segura e rápida.

stable scope: ted.cashout.create
parameters: - $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/X-Correlation-Id' - $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/ApiVersion' - $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/IdempotencyKey' requestBody: content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: amount: type: integer sender: $ref: '#/components/schemas/sender' recipient: $ref: '#/components/schemas/recipient' description: type: string required: - amount responses: '202': description: Ted aceito com sucesso. content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: authenticationCode: type: string description: Código para consulta da transação '400': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/400' '403': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/403' '409': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/409' '422': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/422' '500': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/500' get: tags: - Operações via TED summary: Consulta por conta description: |

Consulte todas as operações TED realizadas na conta informada.

stable scope: ted.cashout.read
parameters: - $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/BankBranchQuery' - $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/AccountNumberQuery' - in: query name: pageSize description: Quantidade de itens que devem retornar na consulta. schema: type : integer - in: query name: nextPage description: Token identificador da próxima página solicitada. schema: type : integer - $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/X-Correlation-Id' - $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/ApiVersion' responses: '200': description: Retorna todas as transações do tipo TED feitas pela conta informada content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: nextPage: type: string description: Valor retornado apenas quando é usado o campo pageSize, e ainda existem dados não apresentados data: type: array items: type: object properties: companyKey: type: string authenticationCode: type: string amount: type: number format: double example: 20.55 description: type: string correlationId: type: string sender: $ref: '#/components/schemas/holderComplete' recipient: $ref: '#/components/schemas/holderComplete' channel: type: string status: type: string createdAt: type: string updatedAt: type: string '400': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/400' '403': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/403' '409': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/409' '422': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/422' '500': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/500' /fund-transfers/{authenticationCode}: get: tags: - Operações via TED summary: Consulta por código de autenticação description: |

Obtenha a operação TED referente ao código de autenticação informado.

stable scope: ted.cashout.read
parameters: - in: path name: authenticationCode description: Identificador retornado ao efetuar transferência via TED. required: true schema: type : string - in: query name: branch description: Agência da conta da qual se deseja obter os detalhes da transferência. required: true schema: type : string - in: query name: account description: Conta da qual se deseja obter o detalhe de transferência. required: true schema: type : string - $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/X-Correlation-Id' - $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/parameters/ApiVersion' responses: '200': description: Retorna a transação do tipo TED referente ao authenticationCode informado content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: companyKey: type: string authenticationCode: type: string amount: type: number format: double example: 20.55 description: type: string correlationId: type: string sender: $ref: '#/components/schemas/holderComplete' recipient: $ref: '#/components/schemas/holderComplete' channel: type: string status: type: string createdAt: type: string updatedAt: type: string '400': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/400' '403': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/403' '409': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/409' '422': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/422' '500': $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/responses/500' security: - Bearer: [] components: schemas: account: type: object properties: branch: $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/schemas/BankBranch' number: type: string bank: $ref: '#/components/schemas/bank' bank: type: object properties: ispb: type: string name: type: string compe: type: string holderComplete: type: object properties: document: type: string name: type: string account: $ref: '#/components/schemas/account' recipient: type: object properties: accountType: type: string document: type: string bankCode: type: string branch: $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/schemas/BankBranch' account: type: string name: type: string required: - branch - account - document - name - accountType - bankCode sender: type: object properties: document: type: string name: type: string branch: $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/schemas/BankBranch' account: $ref: 'http://localhost:3320/commons/components#/components/schemas/AccountNumber' additionalProperties: false securitySchemes: Bearer: type: http description: Inclua o token de autorização do tipo Bearer scheme: bearer bearerFormat: JWT x-readme: explorer-enabled: true proxy-enabled: true samples-enabled: true samples-languages: - curl

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "recipient": parse schema: property "branch": parse schema: at 1:636: external "http://localhost:3320/commons/components": get: http: do: Get "http://localhost:3320/commons/components": host "localhost:3320" is not allowed
